subject: Running
New York City Marathon
lead_paragraph: Haile Gebrselassie, a 34-year-old Ethiopian regarded as perhaps the best distance runner ever, has won 107 races in 55 cities.  But he has never raced in New York.
snippet: Haile Gebrselassie, a 34-year-old Ethiopian regarded as perhaps the best distance runner ever, has won 107 races in 55 cities.  But he has never raced in New York.
